function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of technological awareness among the elderly population","Impact":"Low adoption of wearable devices by elderly people","Mitigation":"Promote technological awareness among the elderly population, test wearable devices for suitability to their needs","Technologies":"Education programs, usability testing","People":"Elderly population","Owner":"Healthcare providers, technology educators"},{"Description":"Data security and patient confidentiality concerns","Impact":"Risk of data breaches and unauthorized access to patient information","Mitigation":"Evaluation of security measures in wearable devices, implementation of encryption and access control","Technologies":"Encryption technology, access control systems","People":"Patients, healthcare providers","Owner":"Technology developers, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Legal, regulatory, and policy challenges","Impact":"Unclear legal and regulatory framework for wearable technologies","Mitigation":"Development of specific legal and regulatory guidelines for wearable devices","Technologies":"Legal frameworks, regulatory guidelines","People":"Technology developers, policymakers","Owner":"Government agencies, industry organizations"}]}
